resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.success: Password reset successfully! You can now log in.
resetPassword.forgotInstruction: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
resetPassword.emailSent: If this email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
resetPassword.emailFailed: Failed to send password reset email.

register.name: Name

register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.

register.noEmailToResend: No email found to resend. Please register again.

accountVerification.title: Account Verification
accountVerification.approved: Your account is verified! Enjoy full access.
accountVerification.pending: Verification pending. Please wait for review.
accountVerification.resubmitInstruction: Please review the requirements and resubmit your documents.
accountVerification.instructions: Send a valid ID, a recent proof of address, and a clear selfie. Only resubmit if rejected.
accountVerification.allFilesRequired: Please upload all required files and take a selfie.
accountVerification.openCameraFirst: Open the camera before taking a selfie.
accountVerification.notVerifiedWarning: Your account is not verified. For greater security and full access, please verify your account now.
